attributes.action: against the proposed cutting of Rail Services in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A cost-cutting proposal by Northern Ireland Railways could mean the end of train services on Sundays.
The Department of Regional Development, which funds railways, is seeking extra money to prevent cutbacks amid rising fuel bills and maintenance costs.
If this funding is not provided, one scenario would see Sunday train services being stopped.
A second scenario would also mean no trains running after 2200 on weekdays.

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/northern_ireland/7694363.stm

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
